summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

The document describes the "Crawling Ones," a type of monstrous, otherworldly creature in the Call of Cthulhu tabletop role-playing game. These creatures are characterized by their ability to dodge attacks and inflict minimal damage on normal weapons, but can cause significant damage with their powerful attacks. The document also introduces the "Dagon & Hydra," two massive, ancient beings that serve as the rulers of the Crawling Ones and are worshiped by various cults throughout history. These beings possess immense strength, size, and magical abilities, making them formidable opponents for investigators.
